main event: A UFO was observed for approximately 5 minutes at Newburgh Park, New York on 11-7-57. It was described as a round object, the size of a pail, with the upper portion yellow and the lower portion orange. The side facing the observer was glowing.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5 minutes, providing a significant duration for the sighting.
The UFO was described as a round object with a glowing side, which is unusual.
The object disappeared from the same position where it initially appeared, suggesting unusual movement.
An aircraft was observed circling in the area after the UFO sighting, indicating potential interest from military or aviation personnel.
The witness, identified as a housewife, reported very clear visibility during the observation.
